text: Soshite (kare-ra ni mukatte,)`arra no o yakusoku wa, hontoni shinjitsudearu. (Shinpan no)-ji wa, utagai no yochi wa nai nodearu.' To tsuge rareru to, anata gata wa,`-ji ga nande aru no ka, watashi-tachi ni wa wakarimasen. Sore wa mattaku okusoku ni suginai to omoimasu. Dakara watashi-tachi wa, shikkari shita kakushin nado motemasen.' To itta
